name: Rural Education and Economic Development (REED)

address: 1172 A Kadhar Sulthan Building, East Coast Road, Manamelkudi Pudukkottai

briefDescription: RURAL EDUCATION AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT TRUST (REED TRUST) is a registered social service organization, working for the welfare and development of poor and marginalized communities in selected vulnerable settlements of Thanjavur and Pudukkottai districts in Tamilnadu state. Starting from the inception , REED had undertaken strategic programs and created significant outcomes leading to social change impact
